name: Jsec cve details
tagline: JSEC CVE DETAILS is an opensource application developed in Java that uses the api provided by cvedetails.com to receive latest CVE updates.
body:
================
![Owasp Image](https://www.owasp.org/images/thumb/d/de/JsecCveDetails.PNG/800px-JsecCveDetails.PNG)
JSEC CVE DETAILS is an opensource application developed in Java that uses the api provided by cvedetails.com to receive latest CVE updates. 

www.cvedetails.com provides an easy to use web interface to CVE vulnerability data.You can browse for vendors, products and versions and view cve entries, vulnerabilities,related to them. You can view statistics about vendors, products and versions of products.CVE details are displayed in a single, easy to use page

This project has been approved by OWASP on 20th August 2014. More details can be found at https://www.owasp.org/index.php/OWASP_JSEC_CVE_Details


* Project/Source Code : https://github.com/dibsy/JSEC_CVE_DETAILS

* Software Download   : https://sourceforge.net/projects/jseccvedetails/

![](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/BqEhqbHCIAAJCpD.png)
